original_text: The people of this city have made me very angry from the time when they built it, even until now. Because of that, I have decided to destroy it completely.
korean_text: 이 성이 건설된 날부터 오늘까지 나의 노여움과 분을 일으키므로 내가 내 앞에서 그것을 옮기려 하노니

sentences.original_text: The people of this city have made me very angry
sentences.korean_translation: 이 성의 백성이 나를 매우 화나게 했다

sentences.original_text: from the time when they built it
I have decided to destroy it completely
